option.name: outputs
option._long: Which display outputs this wallpaper should be on, comma-separated, * for all

option.name: workspaces
option._long: Which workspaces this wallpaper should be on, comma-separated, * for all

option.name: color
option._long: Color to use when there is no working image

option.name: interval
option._long: If a directory is in the path, how many seconds each image from the directory stays on

option.name: speed
option._long: If a directory is in the path, how many milliseconds the transition between images takes

option.name: frameskip
option._long: Only render animated (time-dependent) GLSL (Shadertoy) wallpapers every Nth frame

option.name: sizing_mode
option._long: How to match the image to the screen
